name: cerb.explore.worklist
description: A custom explore mode that tracks real-time changes in a worklist and returns the top sorted unseen record. It maintains a circular ignore list of visited records.
script:
inputs:
  text/worklist_id:
    type: freeform
    required@bool: yes

start:
  set:
    ignore_list@csv:
  
  while:
    if@bool: {{true}}
    do:
      api.command:
        output: currentWorklist
        inputs:
          name: cerb.commands.worklist.search
          params:
            worker_id: {{worker_id}}
            worklist_id: {{inputs.worklist_id}}
            worklist_query@text:
              {% if ignore_list is not empty %}
              id:![{{ignore_list|join(',')}}]
              {% endif %}
              page:0
              limit:1
        on_success:
          set/next:
            nextTicket@key: currentWorklist:data
          # If no next record, end
          decision/result:
            outcome/empty:
              if@bool: {{not nextTicket.record_url}}
              then:
                await:
                  explore:
                    title: {{currentWorklist.worklist.name}}
                    label@text: 
                    toolbar:
                      interaction/next:
                        label: Refresh
                        icon: refresh
                        keyboard: ]
            outcome/next:
              then:
                # Limit the ignore list to 50 items
                set:
                  ignore_list@json: {{ignore_list|slice(-49)|merge([nextTicket.id|round])|json_encode}}
                await:
                  explore:
                    title: {{currentWorklist.worklist.name}}
                    label: {{nextTicket._label}}
                    url: {{nextTicket.record_url}}
                    toolbar:
                      interaction/debug:
                        label: Debug
                        icon: bug
                        uri: cerb:automation:wgm.interaction.echo
                      interaction/next:
                        label: Next
                        icon: chevron-right
                        icon_at: end
                        keyboard: ]
